content:
2010年，AIR在阿姆斯特丹充满活力的夜生活区打开了大门。前夜总会IT在90年代初和00年代定义了伦勃朗广场的气氛，AIR自开业以来一直采用这种工作。多年来，AIR一直专注于一些重要的价值观：宽容、多样性、创造性、质量和自由。该俱乐部在阿姆斯特丹的夜生活中是一个家喻户晓的名字，但它并不只吸引当地的游客。由于我们多样化和国际化的项目，AIR Amsterdam也在国外享有盛名。年复一年，根据DJ MAGS的权威排名，我们进入了世界上100家最佳俱乐部。无论你在寻找什么，AIR都希望提供一种独特的体验!

 

设施

AIR拥有卓越的视听设施，包括最先进的Void Acoustic音响系统。宽敞的入口处有800个储物柜，以确保客人可以安全有效地存放他们的个人物品。俱乐部有五个酒吧，三个洗手间，两个吸烟区和三个房间，每个房间都有自己的设计和氛围。AIR Amsterdam的每个俱乐部之夜都为大约1300名派对客人提供了交际和特别的体验。除了派对，您还可以预订b2b活动、讲座和/或其他会议。我们的专业制作团队总是为每个场合提供合适的解决方案。无论您是来这里开派对还是组织商务活动，AIR都是您的首选之地！
contentEn:
In 2010, AIR opened its doors in the vibrant nightlife area of Amsterdam. Former nightclub IT defined the atmosphere at Rembrandt Square in the early 90’s and 00’s and AIR has adopted this job since its opening. Over the years, AIR has focused on a number of important values: tolerance, diversity, creativity, quality and freedom. The club is a household name in Amsterdam’s nightlife, but it doesn’t only attract local visitors. Due to our diverse and international program, AIR Amsterdam is also renowned abroad. Year after year we make it to the 100 best clubs in the world according to DJ MAGS prestigious ranking. Whatever you're looking for, AIR aspires to deliver an unique experience!

 

FACILITIES

AIR has exceptional audio-visual facilities, including the state of the art Void Acoustic sound system. 800 lockers are available at the spacious entrance to ensure guests can store their personal belongings safely and efficiently. The club has five bars, three restrooms, two smoking areas and three rooms, each with their own design and atmosphere. Every club night AIR Amsterdam provides a sociable and special experience for approximately 1300 party guests. Besides the parties, you can also make reservations for b2b events, lectures and/or other conventions. Our professional production team always comes with a suitable solution for every occasion. Whether you come here to party or to organize a business event: AIR is the place to be!
remarks:
本词条汉字内容由 @多频百科团队 翻译+编辑
原文译自 https://air.nl/en/info/
